Summary: Orange/red circle appeares and dissapears multiple times
divs: sighting detailsat an outdoor concert in houston by the medical center with ems helicopters flying continuously and in the flight path to hobby airport and a large orange\red circle appears in the sky over downtown. the object is larger than the aircraft that are closer to us and much larger than any star. the orange\red color was unlike any of the aircraft. the object hovers and then gets smaller really fast like it is moving away from us at a high rate of speed. this object or another object all of a sudden appears in a different spot then disappears in the same way. this happens 1 more time as we were watching but this time it moves down and then up before disappears in the same way.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There was one other sighting in Houston on or around September 7th 2013
